answers.answer: You 2 gals have been thru so much but your posts clearly indicate your positiveness!! Great stuff! You are an inspiration to all those who are doing it tough!

Let me add my concern in as well...and Dawn?  Your husband is so cute...coming here and posting to all of us.  You could hear the concern in his "voice" when you had to have that one test (bladder?).  Hope you're feeling better and post when you can.

Sonie, I am so sorry you have had such a rough time. My girlfriend who I had lunch with today had a PIK line, she has an infection in the bone in her leg. She had her little fanny pack and she is doing really well. She said you have to watch they don't go "interstitial?" that is, start running into the tissue around the vein.Dawn, that was such a nice post you wrote to that husband. What a sweetie you are.Blessings to both of you   Love, Katie

question: i have been so engrossed with my whole soga that i have not been keeping up...im sorry..how are you doing...going through some post a bit ago,it said you have diabetes????are you ok??how is everything from the surgery going..are you still in pain,or is it getting better...im sorry i havent been a very good friend the past few weeks...im truely sorry.....sonie
title: dawn..how are you???????
